commented_code:
+name: Dispatch Docs
+
+on:
+  release:
+    types: [published]
+
+jobs:
+  dispatch:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    env:
+      EVENT_NAME: compose-docs
+      UPSTREAM_OWNER: docker
+      UPSTREAM_REPO: docker.github.io
+      DOCKERFILE_TARGET: docs-reference
+    steps:
+      -
+        name: Sending ${{ env.EVENT_NAME }} event to ${{ env.UPSTREAM_OWNER }}/${{ env.UPSTREAM_REPO }}
+        uses: actions/github-script@v6
+        with:
+          github-token: ${{ secrets.GHPAT_DOCS_DISPATCH }}

discussion_comments.comment_body: secret is in the org settings, no need to add it in this repo.
